channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 65 Salusbury Road NW6, 14th July
item.description:
An industrial freezer dumped on the pavement outside the SFC chicken shop. Also, that shop consistently dumps food and leaky rubbish bags outside its doors and the pavement needs to be cleaned more regularly because of that.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Palestine flag on street lamp, 14th July
item.description:

item.description:
